titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Finance.

calendar.text: Committee on Finance ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Grassley. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/31/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Finance for the 109th Congress.
